description.fr: Vaincre tous les Craqueleurs. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Ajoute le sort {Spell:213042} à votre main.
description.en: Defeat all the Cracklers. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Adds the {Spell:213042} spell to your hand.
description.es: Vencer a todos los crujidores. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Añade el hechizo {Spell:213042} a tu mano.
description.de: Alle Krachler besiegen. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Fügt deiner Hand den Zauber {Spell:213042} hinzu.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Smagadores. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Adiciona o feitiço {Spell:213042} à sua mão.
